subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Benoit Pouliot scored two goals, Brian Rolston had a goal and three assists and the Boston Bruins completed a six-game season sweep of the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs.
snippet: Benoit Pouliot scored two goals, Brian Rolston had a goal and three assists and the Boston Bruins completed a six-game season sweep of the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs.
